text: Ha! Jenumanja ni aŵala ŵankuŵilanjidwa kuti ntole petala lya Allah, basi ŵane mwa jenumanja pana ŵaakutenda ubayili. Sano jwaakutenda ubayili nikuti akutenda ubayili waalikonya nsyene, sano Allah ni Jwakupata kwejinji, nambo jenumanja ni ŵakulaga. Nambo naga nkugalauka (kuleka Usilamu, Allah) tantindanye niŵandu ŵane ŵangaŵaga jenumanja, soni ngasaŵa ŵanti mpela jenumanja (tachiŵa ŵambone)
